title: Gods vniuersal right proclaimed A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the 27. of March 1603. being the next Sunday after her Maiesties departure. By I.H.
author: Hayward, John, D.D.
notes: Running title reads: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse the 27. of March. 1603.
